title: Hour 3 - Chris Mannix, Sal Paolantonio
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Chris Mannix, Sal Paolantonio
description:
Dan talks to NBA insider Chris Mannix about Kevin Durant's continuing trade demands. And he checks in with NFL insider Sal Paolantonio as the NFL preseason gets underway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
